site_name: Barons Court56 The Bishops AvenueLondonN2 0BE
description: Non-material amendments to planning permission reference 21/0263/FUL dated 13/10/2021 for `Full demolition of the existing building (use class C3) and construction of a new building of part 4 storey and part 6 storey (5 above ground) with the uppermost storey of both elements providing accommodation within the roof. New building to provide residential accommodation (use class C3) of 109 apartments with basement car parking, associated communal areas, amenity space, refuse/recycling storage and cycle storage. Provision of 135 off-street parking spaces within the basement, accessed via ramped access, and 10 further spaces above ground`. Amendments include removal of the wording `109 apartments with basement car parking. Provision of 135 off-street parking spaces within the basement, and 10 further spaces above ground.` And replacing it with Provision of off-street car parking spaces at ground and basement level accessed via ramped access. Two new conditions to be added to the planning permission to reference the number of residential units and car parking spaces capable of being provided within the approved development.
